pages.title: Levitate
pages.text: Cost: Lv1 = Spell + Shulker Shell / Lv2 = Spell + Elytra $(br2)Max Level: 2$(br2)XP Cost: Lv1 = 12 / Lv2 = 24$(br2)One of the harder spells to craft but extremely useful for clearing away annoying and pesky players and mobs!

When you cast the spell, a small projectile is cast from you. $(br)When the spell hits an entity, it will grant them the Potion Effect 'Levitation' (The higher level the spell is, the longer the status effect will be granted for).
